name: Feed the Fire (aGoldenFly)
description:
Feed the Fire is a fast-paced, arcade game where you must fulfill orders of different types of fruit in order to rack up points!

Use your fruit gun to suck up fruit from trees that are around the map, and shoot out the fruit into the oven at the center to make a delicious pie!

After completing a few orders, purchase powerups to help you go even faster!

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Suck up fruits/powerups

Right Mouse Button - Shoot out fruits

Escape - Pause

Tips

- Always stay on the move! These fruit trees don't stick around for long!

- Know your range! You don't have to stand right next to the oven!

- Make use of powerups! Increase your movement speed, fire speed, inventory space, and even your time!
